name: Solar IRC
short_description:
Solar IRC is an IRC client. 
Multiserver, File transfer, Channel for drawing, ICQ, MP3 player, Skins system, Play Chess, Online help, Reader and printer for 'log' files, Bot for IRC-Hispano, Bot for UnionGlobal, Children Restriccion, Proxy.
